dn14:2.8.3_2: bandhumā rājā vipassissa kumārassa bhiyyoso mattāya pañca kāmaguṇāni upaṭṭhāpesi:
dn14:2.8.4_1: yathā vipassī kumāro na agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajeyya,
dn14:2.8.4_2: yathā nemittānaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ micchā assa vacanan’ti.
dn14:2.9.1_0: Tatra sudaṁ, bhikkhave, vipassī kumāro pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgībhūto paricāreti.
dn14:2.9.2_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassī kumāro bahūnaṁ vassānaṁ …pe…
dn14:2.10.1_2: vipassī kumāro uyyānabhūmiṁ niyyanto mahājanakāyaṁ sannipatitaṁ nānārattānañca dussānaṁ vilātaṁ kayiramānaṁ.
dn14:2.10.3_0: ‘kiṁ nu kho so, samma sārathi, mahājanakāyo sannipatito nānārattānañca dussānaṁ vilātaṁ kayiratī’ti?
dn14:2.10.5_0: ‘Tena hi, samma sārathi, yena so kālaṅkato tena rathaṁ pesehī’ti.
dn14:2.10.6_3: sārathi vipassissa kumārassa paṭissutvā yena so kālaṅkato tena rathaṁ pesesi.
dn14:2.10.7_0: Addasā kho, bhikkhave, vipassī kumāro petaṁ kālaṅkataṁ, disvā sārathiṁ āmantesi:
dn14:2.10.9_2: Na dāni taṁ dakkhanti mātā vā pitā vā aññe vā ñātisālohitā,
dn14:2.10.9_3: sopi na dakkhissati mātaraṁ vā pitaraṁ vā aññe vā ñātisālohite’ti.
dn14:2.10.10_0: ‘Kiṁ pana, samma sārathi, ahampi maraṇadhammo maraṇaṁ anatīto;
dn14:2.10.11_0: mampi na dakkhanti devo vā devī vā aññe vā ñātisālohitā;
dn14:2.10.12_0: ahampi na dakkhissāmi devaṁ vā deviṁ vā aññe vā ñātisālohite’ti?
dn14:2.10.13_0: ‘Tvañca, deva, mayañcamha sabbe maraṇadhammā maraṇaṁ anatītā;
dn14:2.10.14_0: tampi na dakkhanti devo vā devī vā aññe vā ñātisālohitā;
dn14:2.10.15_0: tvampi na dakkhissasi devaṁ vā deviṁ vā aññe vā ñātisālohite’ti.
dn14:2.10.16_0: ‘Tena hi, samma sārathi, alaṁ dānajja uyyānabhūmiyā, itova antepuraṁ paccaniyyāhī’ti.
dn14:2.10.17_3: sārathi vipassissa kumārassa paṭissutvā tatova antepuraṁ paccaniyyāsi.
dn14:2.10.18_0: Tatra sudaṁ, bhikkhave, vipassī kumāro antepuraṁ gato dukkhī dummano pajjhāyati:
dn14:2.10.19_2: yatra hi nāma jātassa jarā paññāyissati,
dn14:2.11.1_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, bandhumā rājā sārathiṁ āmantāpetvā etadavoca:
dn14:2.11.3_1: kumāro uyyānabhūmiyā abhiramittha, na kho, deva,
dn14:2.11.4_0: ‘Kiṁ pana, samma sārathi, addasa kumāro uyyānabhūmiṁ niyyanto’ti?
dn14:2.11.5_1: kumāro uyyānabhūmiṁ niyyanto mahājanakāyaṁ sannipatitaṁ nānārattānañca dussānaṁ vilātaṁ kayiramānaṁ.
dn14:2.11.7_0: “kiṁ nu kho so, samma sārathi, mahājanakāyo sannipatito nānārattānañca dussānaṁ vilātaṁ kayiratī”ti?
dn14:2.11.9_0: “Tena hi, samma sārathi, yena so kālaṅkato tena rathaṁ pesehī”ti.
dn14:2.11.10_2: vipassissa kumārassa paṭissutvā yena so kālaṅkato tena rathaṁ pesesiṁ.
dn14:2.11.11_0: Addasā kho, deva, kumāro petaṁ kālaṅkataṁ, disvā maṁ etadavoca:
dn14:2.11.14_0: Na dāni taṁ dakkhanti mātā vā pitā vā aññe vā ñātisālohitā,
dn14:2.11.14_1: sopi na dakkhissati mātaraṁ vā pitaraṁ vā aññe vā ñātisālohite”ti.
dn14:2.11.15_0: “Kiṁ pana, samma sārathi, ahampi maraṇadhammo maraṇaṁ anatīto;
dn14:2.11.16_0: mampi na dakkhanti devo vā devī vā aññe vā ñātisālohitā;
dn14:2.11.17_0: ahampi na dakkhissāmi devaṁ vā deviṁ vā aññe vā ñātisālohite”ti?
dn14:2.11.18_0: “Tvañca, deva, mayañcamha sabbe maraṇadhammā maraṇaṁ anatītā;
dn14:2.11.19_0: tampi na dakkhanti devo vā devī vā aññe vā ñātisālohitā,
dn14:2.11.19_1: tvampi na dakkhissasi devaṁ vā deviṁ vā aññe vā ñātisālohite”ti.
dn14:2.11.20_0: “Tena hi, samma sārathi, alaṁ dānajja uyyānabhūmiyā, itova antepuraṁ paccaniyyāhī”ti.
dn14:2.11.21_0: “Evaṁ, devā”ti kho ahaṁ, deva, vipassissa kumārassa paṭissutvā tatova antepuraṁ paccaniyyāsiṁ.
dn14:2.11.22_0: So kho, deva, kumāro antepuraṁ gato dukkhī dummano pajjhāyati:
dn14:2.11.23_2: yatra hi nāma jātassa jarā paññāyissati,
dn14:2.12.1_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, bandhumassa rañño etadahosi:
dn14:2.12.2_0: ‘mā heva kho vipassī kumāro na rajjaṁ kāresi,
dn14:2.12.2_1: mā heva vipassī kumāro agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbaji,
dn14:2.12.2_2: mā heva nemittānaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ saccaṁ assa vacanan’ti.
dn14:2.12.3_2: bandhumā rājā vipassissa kumārassa bhiyyoso mattāya pañca kāmaguṇāni upaṭṭhāpesi:
dn14:2.12.4_1: yathā vipassī kumāro na agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajeyya,
dn14:2.12.4_2: yathā nemittānaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ micchā assa vacanan’ti.
dn14:2.13.1_0: Tatra sudaṁ, bhikkhave, vipassī kumāro pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgībhūto paricāreti.
dn14:2.13.2_2: vipassī kumāro bahūnaṁ vassānaṁ bahūnaṁ vassasatānaṁ bahūnaṁ vassasahassānaṁ accayena sārathiṁ āmantesi:
dn14:2.13.3_0: ‘yojehi, samma sārathi, bhaddāni bhaddāni yānāni, uyyānabhūmiṁ gacchāma subhūmidassanāyā’ti.
dn14:2.13.4_3: sārathi vipassissa kumārassa paṭissutvā bhaddāni bhaddāni yānāni yojetvā vipassissa kumārassa paṭivedesi:
dn14:2.13.5_0: ‘yuttāni kho te, deva, bhaddāni bhaddāni yānāni,
dn14:2.13.7_2: vipassī kumāro bhaddaṁ bhaddaṁ yānaṁ abhiruhitvā bhaddehi bhaddehi yānehi uyyānabhūmiṁ niyyāsi.
dn14:2.14.1_2: vipassī kumāro uyyānabhūmiṁ niyyanto purisaṁ bhaṇḍuṁ pabbajitaṁ kāsāyavasanaṁ.
dn14:2.14.4_0: Sīsampissa na yathā aññesaṁ, vatthānipissa na yathā aññesan’ti?
dn14:2.14.7_1: pabbajito nāma sādhu dhammacariyā sādhu samacariyā sādhu kusalakiriyā sādhu puññakiriyā sādhu avihiṁsā sādhu bhūtānukampā’ti.
dn14:2.14.8_3: sādhu dhammacariyā sādhu samacariyā sādhu kusalakiriyā sādhu puññakiriyā sādhu avihiṁsā sādhu bhūtānukampā.
dn14:2.14.9_0: Tena hi, samma sārathi, yena so pabbajito tena rathaṁ pesehī’ti.
dn14:2.14.10_3: sārathi vipassissa kumārassa paṭissutvā yena so pabbajito tena rathaṁ pesesi.
dn14:2.14.11_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassī kumāro taṁ pabbajitaṁ etadavoca:
dn14:2.14.13_0: sīsampi te na yathā aññesaṁ, vatthānipi te na yathā aññesan’ti?
dn14:2.14.16_2: sādhu dhammacariyā sādhu samacariyā sādhu kusalakiriyā sādhu puññakiriyā sādhu avihiṁsā sādhu bhūtānukampā’ti.
dn14:2.14.17_1: pabbajito nāma sādhu dhammacariyā sādhu samacariyā sādhu kusalakiriyā sādhu puññakiriyā sādhu avihiṁsā sādhu bhūtānukampā’ti.
dn14:2.15.1_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassī kumāro sārathiṁ āmantesi:
dn14:2.15.2_0: ‘tena hi, samma sārathi, rathaṁ ādāya itova antepuraṁ paccaniyyāhi.
dn14:2.15.3_0: Ahaṁ pana idheva kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajissāmī’ti.
dn14:2.15.4_3: sārathi vipassissa kumārassa paṭissutvā rathaṁ ādāya tatova antepuraṁ paccaniyyāsi.
dn14:2.15.5_0: Vipassī pana kumāro tattheva kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbaji.
dn14:2.16.1_0: Assosi kho, bhikkhave, bandhumatiyā rājadhāniyā mahājanakāyo caturāsītipāṇasahassāni:
dn14:2.16.2_0: ‘vipassī kira kumāro kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito’ti.
dn14:2.16.4_2: yattha vipassī kumāro kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito.
dn14:2.16.5_0: Vipassīpi nāma kumāro kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajissati,
dn14:2.16.6_2: mahājanakāyo caturāsītipāṇasahassāni kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā vipassiṁ bodhisattaṁ
dn14:2.16.7_2: parisāya parivuto vipassī bodhisatto gāmanigamajanapadarājadhānīsu cārikaṁ carati.
dn14:2.17.1_2: vipassissa bodhisattassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
dn14:2.17.2_0: ‘na kho metaṁ patirūpaṁ yohaṁ ākiṇṇo viharāmi, yannūnāhaṁ eko gaṇamhā vūpakaṭṭho vihareyyan’ti.
dn14:2.17.3_2: vipassī bodhisatto aparena samayena eko gaṇamhā vūpakaṭṭho vihāsi,
dn14:2.18.1_2: vipassissa bodhisattassa vāsūpagatassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
dn14:2.18.2_1: jāyati ca jīyati ca mīyati ca cavati ca upapajjati ca,
dn14:2.18.2_2: atha ca panimassa dukkhassa nissaraṇaṁ nappajānāti jarāmaraṇassa,
dn14:2.18.3_0: kudāssu nāma imassa dukkhassa nissaraṇaṁ paññāyissati jarāmaraṇassā’ti?
dn14:2.18.4_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.18.5_0: ‘kimhi nu kho sati jarāmaraṇaṁ hoti, kiṁpaccayā jarāmaraṇan’ti?
dn14:2.18.6_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.7_0: ‘jātiyā kho sati jarāmaraṇaṁ hoti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇan’ti.
dn14:2.18.8_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.18.9_0: ‘kimhi nu kho sati jāti hoti, kiṁpaccayā jātī’ti?
dn14:2.18.10_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.11_0: ‘bhave kho sati jāti hoti, bhavapaccayā jātī’ti.
dn14:2.18.12_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.18.13_0: ‘kimhi nu kho sati bhavo hoti, kiṁpaccayā bhavo’ti?
dn14:2.18.14_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.15_0: ‘upādāne kho sati bhavo hoti, upādānapaccayā bhavo’ti.
dn14:2.18.16_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.18.17_0: ‘kimhi nu kho sati upādānaṁ hoti, kiṁpaccayā upādānan’ti?
dn14:2.18.18_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.19_0: ‘taṇhāya kho sati upādānaṁ hoti, taṇhāpaccayā upādānan’ti.
dn14:2.18.20_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.18.21_0: ‘kimhi nu kho sati taṇhā hoti, kiṁpaccayā taṇhā’ti?
dn14:2.18.22_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.23_0: ‘vedanāya kho sati taṇhā hoti, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā’ti.
dn14:2.18.24_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.18.25_0: ‘kimhi nu kho sati vedanā hoti, kiṁpaccayā vedanā’ti?
dn14:2.18.26_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.27_0: ‘phasse kho sati vedanā hoti, phassapaccayā vedanā’ti.
dn14:2.18.28_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.18.29_0: ‘kimhi nu kho sati phasso hoti, kiṁpaccayā phasso’ti?
dn14:2.18.30_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.31_0: ‘saḷāyatane kho sati phasso hoti, saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso’ti.
dn14:2.18.32_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.18.33_0: ‘kimhi nu kho sati saḷāyatanaṁ hoti, kiṁpaccayā saḷāyatanan’ti?
dn14:2.18.34_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.35_0: ‘nāmarūpe kho sati saḷāyatanaṁ hoti, nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanan’ti.
dn14:2.18.36_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.18.37_0: ‘kimhi nu kho sati nāmarūpaṁ hoti, kiṁpaccayā nāmarūpan’ti?
dn14:2.18.38_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.39_0: ‘viññāṇe kho sati nāmarūpaṁ hoti, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpan’ti.
dn14:2.18.40_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.18.41_0: ‘kimhi nu kho sati viññāṇaṁ hoti, kiṁpaccayā viññāṇan’ti?
dn14:2.18.42_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.43_0: ‘nāmarūpe kho sati viññāṇaṁ hoti, nāmarūpapaccayā viññāṇan’ti.
dn14:2.19.1_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.19.2_0: ‘paccudāvattati kho idaṁ viññāṇaṁ nāmarūpamhā, nāparaṁ gacchati.
dn14:2.19.3_0: Ettāvatā jāyetha vā jiyyetha vā miyyetha vā cavetha vā upapajjetha vā, yadidaṁ
dn14:2.19.6_2: vipassissa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi,
dn14:2.20.1_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.20.2_0: ‘kimhi nu kho asati jarāmaraṇaṁ na hoti, kissa nirodhā jarāmaraṇanirodho’ti?
dn14:2.20.3_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.4_0: ‘jātiyā kho asati jarāmaraṇaṁ na hoti, jātinirodhā jarāmaraṇanirodho’ti.
dn14:2.20.5_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.20.6_0: ‘kimhi nu kho asati jāti na hoti, kissa nirodhā jātinirodho’ti?
dn14:2.20.7_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.8_0: ‘bhave kho asati jāti na hoti, bhavanirodhā jātinirodho’ti.
dn14:2.20.9_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.20.10_0: ‘kimhi nu kho asati bhavo na hoti, kissa nirodhā bhavanirodho’ti?
dn14:2.20.11_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.12_0: ‘upādāne kho asati bhavo na hoti, upādānanirodhā bhavanirodho’ti.
dn14:2.20.13_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.20.14_0: ‘kimhi nu kho asati upādānaṁ na hoti, kissa nirodhā upādānanirodho’ti?
dn14:2.20.15_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.16_0: ‘taṇhāya kho asati upādānaṁ na hoti, taṇhānirodhā upādānanirodho’ti.
dn14:2.20.17_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.20.18_0: ‘kimhi nu kho asati taṇhā na hoti, kissa nirodhā taṇhānirodho’ti?
dn14:2.20.19_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.20_0: ‘vedanāya kho asati taṇhā na hoti, vedanānirodhā taṇhānirodho’ti.
dn14:2.20.21_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.20.22_0: ‘kimhi nu kho asati vedanā na hoti, kissa nirodhā vedanānirodho’ti?
dn14:2.20.23_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.24_0: ‘phasse kho asati vedanā na hoti, phassanirodhā vedanānirodho’ti.
dn14:2.20.25_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.20.26_0: ‘kimhi nu kho asati phasso na hoti, kissa nirodhā phassanirodho’ti?
dn14:2.20.27_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.28_0: ‘saḷāyatane kho asati phasso na hoti, saḷāyatananirodhā phassanirodho’ti.
dn14:2.20.29_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.20.30_0: ‘kimhi nu kho asati saḷāyatanaṁ na hoti, kissa nirodhā saḷāyatananirodho’ti?
dn14:2.20.31_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.32_0: ‘nāmarūpe kho asati saḷāyatanaṁ na hoti, nāmarūpanirodhā saḷāyatananirodho’ti.
dn14:2.20.33_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
